lead_paragraph: One team went without the services of its Hall of Fame-bound quarterback for more than a third of the season, and when he was available, he was a shell of his former self.

headline.print_headline: Despite Injuries, Issues, Broncos, Patriots Stay in the Hunt
headline.main: Despite Injuries, Issues, Broncos, Patriots Stay in the Hunt
